sentences.sentence: He clambered into his bunk and rolled himself well up in the blankets, as a swathe of barley is folded into the arms of the reaping machine.
sentences.translation: 河鼠爬进他的床铺，用毯子把自己紧紧裹住，就像一行大麦落进了收割机的怀抱一样。

sentences.sentence: They are now reaping the rewards of all their hard work.
sentences.translation: 现在，他们的全部辛劳都得到了回报。

sentences.sentence: The company is now reaping the rewards of their investments.
sentences.translation: 公司正在收获他们的投资回报。
